text: Christodoulos Xiros (born 1958) is a Greek terrorist and member of November 17. He participated in the murders of Nikos Momferatos, Panagiotis Roussetis, Nikos Georgakopoulos, Dimitris Angelopoulos and US Navy Captain William Nordeen. He was put on trial in 2002.
